heading: Advanced Microbiology and Research Foundations
subHeading: Concepts, laboratory methods, microbial biotechnology, and advanced scientific applications.
quickIntro: The M.Sc Microbiology program enhances your expertise in microbial biotechnology, clinical microbiology, molecular biology, immunology, and research methodology. This course prepares students for research labs, biotech companies, hospitals, and doctoral studies.

infoBox.subjects: Molecular Biology, Immunology, Microbial Genetics, Bioprocess Technology
infoBox.target: Research labs, diagnostic labs, biotech R&D, PhD programs
infoBox.questions: Advanced unit-wise MCQs and previous-year questions

featuresSection.title: Advanced Microbiology Expertise
featuresSection.subtitle: Research-driven curriculum with laboratory immersion and modern techniques.

bottomBanner.title: Start Your Microbiology Research Journey
bottomBanner.subtitle: Master advanced microbial science concepts and laboratory methods.
